newsitem.title: USA: U.S. hog and cattle slaughter estimates - trade.
newsitem.headline: U.S. hog and cattle slaughter estimates - trade.

text.p: Livestock analysts estimate Friday's hog slaughter from 327,000 to 346,000 head versus 344,000 a week ago and 336,000 a year ago.
Saturday's hog slaughter estimates ranged from 40,000 to 60,000 head versus 28,000 a week ago and 106,000 a year ago.
Cattle slaughter estimates ranged from 130,000 to 132,000 head versus 131,000 a week ago and 130,000 a year ago.
Saturday's cattle slaughter estimates ranged from 50,000 to 70,000 head versus 63,000 a week ago and 68,000 a year ago.
